article: Mary is my friend. Her mother's birthday is coming. She wants to buy a birthday present  _  her mother. But she doesn't have  _  money. She can't buy one. She is very  _  . She thinks and thinks. She has an idea . She can make a present by herself. So she uses a piece of paper  to make  a card. On the front, she  _  a beautiful house with some flowers around it. On the back she writes, "To my dearest mummy in the world. I will buy you a real  _  like this."  _  her mother's birthday, Mary gives her the card. After she sees the card, tears fall down from her face. "  _  are you crying?" Mary asks, "You don't like it, right?" "Of course not," she says, "I love it very much. I  _  because I am the happiest mother in the world. I have a great  _  . I love you forever."
